Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Orbinaut MajorTom here. Just joined KSP two days ago and am hooked...you've got a great thing going! Just the right amount of everything...develop your own ships, fly them, simplified universe, cute little Kerbals (who mysteriously regenerate after you kill them!), but the physics is dead on. So addictive!

Looking forward to 0.23 with great anticipation!

Cheers y'all...
The mix of silly and serious is what won me over, too. Welcome to the game, and the forum.

Just wait until you start getting into the mods. KSP is great, and with some of the extra mods it becomes ridiculous!

Welcome to the wonderful world of KSP, and to forums of course
